materials.raw_text:
Lithium phosphate (Li3PO4): 21.4 g 
 Praseodymium oxide (Pr2O3): 16.1 g 
 Silicon dioxide (SiO2): 32.3 g 
 Lithium carbonate (Li2CO3): 5.6 g

sourcing.instructions:
Lithium phosphate can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online suppliers specializing in raw materials. 
 Praseodymium oxide is available through rare earth metal suppliers. 
 Silicon dioxide is widely available at chemical supply stores or online. 
 Lithium carbonate can be found at chemical supply retailers or specialty chemical distributors.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 21.4 g of lithium phosphate and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 16.1 g of praseodymium oxide to the container. 
 3. Incorporate 32.3 g of silicon dioxide into the mixture. 
 4. Finally, add 5.6 g of lithium carbonate. 
 5. Using a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer, thoroughly mix the components until a homogenous powder is achieved.
